item.description:
Learn what you can do to make a difference and help put an end to puppy mills

Meet Lilly the Hero Pit Bull

K-9 Police Dog Demo by Essex County Sheriff's Dept.

Demo by Susan Parker of The Little Rhodie Bully Breed Club showing Pit Bulls in training to become therapy dogs

Obedience Training Demo

Doggie Parade, with or without costume

Raffle, doggie kissing booth, informal agility course

Tables offering info and services

Rescue groups with animals to adopt

Presentation about ALDF and PuppyMillRescue.com (to whom all proceeds are donated)

Rain Date Sept 23

www.pmadSalem.org
FB Page = PMAD Salem
978-745-5288
HelpSavePuppies@verizon.net

Contact person: Natalie Femino
PMAD is presented in conjunction with National PMAD
item.name: Puppy Mill Awareness Day (PMAD)
